forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 13C. Winds N at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 56F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
